front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Identity-Based Cryptographic Techniques using Pairings

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard specifies common identity-based public-key cryptographic techniques that use pairings, including mathematical primitives for secret value (key) derivation, public-key encryption, and digital signatures, and cryptographic schemes based on those primitives. It also specifies related cryptographic parameters, public keys and private keys. The purpose of this standard is to provide a reference for specifications of a variety of techniques from which applications may select.
